member.name: M:LocalDb.SqlInstance.Build(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Build database with a name based on the calling Method.
member.param: The path to the test class. Used to make the database name unique per test type.
For Xunit theories add some text based on the inline data to make the db name unique.
Used to make the db name unique per method. Will default to the caller method name is used.

member.name: M:LocalDb.SqlInstance.Build(System.String)
member.summary: Build database with an explicit name.

member.name: M:LocalDb.SqlInstance.BuildWithRollback
member.summary: Build DB with a transaction that is rolled back when disposed.
